song.title: South Australia
song.chorus: Haul away your rolling king, heave away, haul away Haul away, you'll hear me sing, we're bound for South Australia
song.verse: In South Australia I was born, (heave away, haul away) In South Australia, 'round Cape Horn, (we're bound for South Australia)
As I walked out one morning fair 'Twas there I met Miss Nancy Blair
I shook her up I shook her down I shook her all around that town
There's just one thing that's on my mind That's leaving Nancy Blair behind
As you wallop round Cape Horn You'll wish to God you've never been born
As I land on Australia sand A bottle of whiskey in me hand
It's back again to Liverpool To spend me pay like a bloody fool
